answerText: Rub' al Khali [or Empty Quarter][10] Although mostly in Saudi Arabia, the Rub' al Khali also extends into this nation, which contains the easternmost point of the Arabian Peninsula. With its capital at Muscat, this country contains the southern region of Dhofar.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Northwestern A | 7 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This region contains the Wabar impact craters, first discovered in the 1930s Â– about the same time people figured out there was any reason at all to be here. For 10 points each: [10] Name this desert on the Arabian Peninsula, the largest continuous stretch of sand in the world. This largely uninhabited region also contains many lakebeds and the Ghawar oil field.
